dict.acceptation: 可能的；可接受的；合理的，可以允许的；不坏的；
可能性，潜在性；可能的人物，可能有的事；最高分；

sent.orig: When you read as loudly as possible, as clearly as possible and as quickly as possible.
sent.trans: 当你读的时候，要尽量大声，尽量清晰和尽量快速。

sent.orig: As soon as possible to take measures as soon as possible to see the results.
sent.trans: 要尽快采取措施，尽快见到效果。

sent.orig: It becomes apparent that there is a perfect labyrinth of possible questions and possible answers.
sent.trans: 显然地就出现了一座包含各种可能的问题和可能的答案的迷宫。

sent.orig: Henan more should asas possible takes corresponding countermeasure and concrete step, do comprehensive strength asas possible.
sent.trans: 河南更应及早采取相应的对策和具体措施，尽快把综合实力搞上去。

sent.orig: He weighed each possible answer, seeking out possible flaws, and as they were discovered, discarding them.
sent.trans: 他掂量着每一个可能的答案，寻找线索。
